#2.1 Load the tidyverse and read in your ACS data.

\`\`\`{r}

library (tidyverse)

acs_data_2024 \<- read_csv("gov51-ps1/data/raw/acs2024.csv.gz")

#2.2 Using the IPUMS documentation (online at https://usa.ipums.org), look up what each
variable in your dataset means.

#2.3 Create new variables from the raw IPUMS codes.

\`\`\`{r}

mutate (female = if_else(SEX == 2, 1, 0))
